website_summaries.verdict: The Vivobarefoot Primus Lite, owing to its amazing design, high comfortability and incredible looks, has the vote of the majority. The individuals loved the natural feel of the ground, which the shoe allowed. At the same time, they were satisfied with the protection the sole unit offered.
pros: The majority found the Vivobarefoot Primus Lite to be a highly comfortable shoe
Most of the users highly appreciated the very light weight of the footwear
Several customers highlighted that the shoe had a reliable capacity to adapt to the natural shape and movement of the foot
A few runners welcomed the minimalist, closer-to-ground feel by saying that it was like ‘feeling the natural ground but with protection’
Some purchasers said that they liked the overall look of the shoe
A few users mentioned that they loved the colors the footwear was available in
A wearer said that the shoes were comfortable ‘even without socks’
cons: A runner said that it took him time to get used to the shoe

customer_reviews.title: Very different, but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Have had these for a month now and have walked, run and yesterday did a 400m interval session with them. They are excellent, and while taking some time to adjust, for me in particular, as I came from Hoka One! My feet are stronger and this has made my base more stable when squatting and deadlifting (I’m also wearing them for that too). You do feel the quality of the surface you’re walking on and when running, some large stones are felt. The fact there is no support in the sole, means you have to change your running gait to land on your forefoot or risk slamming heel on the ground if you don’t.
customer_reviews.author: Baz

customer_reviews.title: Top trainer for working out (flat footed)
customer_reviews.text: These are great for training and lifting and I wear them at the gym (only) every time. I don't run, so not used them for that, but doing circuits, rowing and lifting they're great. Very well made and they look like they'll last, but time will tell. They're expensive, but you get a top shoe. I've had a few different barefoot type shoes and these are proper minimal. They've replace my adidas toe shoes, which have worn out, they'll be a big change if you're moving from a normal shoe, but pretty close to the toe shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Peters

customer_reviews.title: Perfect barefoot shoe
customer_reviews.text: I'm trying to get into wearing barefoot shoes and Vivobarefoot seems to be the market leader. I gave these a shot and they look great, feel great on my feet and are certainly barefoot feeling! I'm still working on getting used to wearing them all the time, I am currently doing short stints. Would definitely recommend these if you're looking for that barefoot feeling with an everyday shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Stu

customer_reviews.title: Blisters and they went yellow!
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to my second pair of Vivo because the first pair lasted so well and so comfortable. I've been really disappointed with these. I got blisters on the top of both feet and after only 6 months they've become very discoloured, the outside parts going yellow. Barely worn them so unsure how this has happened.
customer_reviews.author: WozT

customer_reviews.title: already falling apart
customer_reviews.text: soles have started separating from the shoe after less than a month of light everyday use. very disappointed — especially for the price i paid ( £110.00 )
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Michael Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Slightly bigger then expected
customer_reviews.text: I've picked up these shoes based on online reviews as I wasn't able to find anything comfy enough. Went with the manufacturer's size guide and so picked up size 11. I'm normally in between 10.5 and 11 depending on the model and brand. I feel size 11 is rather large but 10 would be definitely too small. So I'm not sure if these are for me albeit comfortable for walking.
customer_reviews.author: Gio

customer_reviews.title: Great all rounder
customer_reviews.text: These are really well made shoes. Used them both for long walks and hiit training and they work really well for both. You’d expect a flat sole shoe to be uncomfortable, but there’s enough stability in the sole that it makes for a comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.author: MR S.

customer_reviews.title: Great barefoot shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great barefoot shoes. Really trust this company and their ethos!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable and very well made
customer_reviews.text: Superb shoes. So comfortable and very well made. Have several pairs and they never disappoint. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Niall

customer_reviews.title: Great barefoot shoe
customer_reviews.text: They come on the larger side but that is to be expected as the point is to let your toes have room.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Faulty item, the glue of the sole is not strong enough
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vivobarefoot shoes, and after 4 uses, the sole took off, It's a faulty item because only I was using this shoes to walk, I didn't practise sport, I didnt put it on the washing machine. the glue of the sole is not strong enough
customer_reviews.author: Ismael

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly. Shoes are a new experience but what I expected based on other reviews. So far so good. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Gee Ride

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for just under a week now. So far they are incredible. I can honestly say these are the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Haddock

customer_reviews.title: Stylish barefoot shoe
customer_reviews.text: Excellent barefoot shoe, fits great, super comfy and well made. I’m already planning on getting a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: John Spencer

product_meta.title: VIVOBAREFOOT Primus Lite, Mens Vegan Light Movement Breathable Shoe With Barefoot Sole and No-Sew Construction
feature_bullets: Breathable 3M Airmesh upper with laminated PU overlays
Patented, ultra-thin, puncture resistant rubber sole
